trans-unit.source: Represents a 4 x 4 matrix used for transformations in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] space.
trans-unit.target: 表示用于在中进行转换的 4 x 4 矩阵[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)]空间。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D has the following row-vector syntax: ||||| |-|-|-|-| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M12%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M13%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M14%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M21%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M22%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M23%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M24%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M31%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M32%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M33%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M34%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetX%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetY%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetZ%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M44%2A>| Note that because the fourth column is also accessible, the matrix allows developers to represent affine as well as non-affine transforms.
trans-unit.target: Matrix3D 具有以下行向量语法: | | | |-|-|-|-| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M12%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M13%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M14%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M21%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M22%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M23%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M24%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M31%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M32%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M33%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M34%2A>| |<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetX%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetY%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetZ%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M44%2A>| 请注意，由于第四列还可访问的矩阵允许开发人员来表示仿射以及非仿射转换。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M44%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetZ%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.OffsetX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M34%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M33%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M32%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M31%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M24%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M23%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M22%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M21%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M14%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M13%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M12%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A>

trans-unit.source: Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵可以追加或预置到其他矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ## XAML Attribute Usage ``` - or - ``` ## XAML Values *M11* The value in the first row and first column of this Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 将矩阵 A 追加到矩阵 B 表示转换按 B 和 a: # # XAML 属性用法``` - or - ``` # # XAML 值*M11* 中的第一行和此 Matrix3D 第一列的值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.M11%2A>

trans-unit.source: Constructor that sets matrix's initial values.
trans-unit.target: 设置矩阵的初始值的构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (1,1) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (1，1) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (1,2) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (1，2) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (1,3) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (1，3) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (1,4) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (1，4) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (2,1) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (2，1) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (2,2) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (2，2) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (2,3) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (2，3) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (2,4) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的 (2，4) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (3,1) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵 (3，1) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (3,2) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵 (3，2) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (3,3) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵 (3，3) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (3,4) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵 (3，4) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the X offset field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的字段偏移量的 X 值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the Y offset field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的字段偏移量的 Y 值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the Z offset field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵的字段偏移量的 Z 值。

trans-unit.source: Value of the (4,4) field of the new matrix.
trans-unit.target: 新矩阵 (4，4) 字段的值。

trans-unit.source: Appends a specified matrix to the current matrix.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的矩阵追加到当前的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Matrices can be appended or prepended to other matrices.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵可以追加或预置到其他矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Appending matrix A to matrix B denotes a transformation by B and then by A: ``` A(B(...)) ``` Prepending A to B denotes a transformation by A and then by B: ``` B(A(...)) ``` To transform point P by A and then by B, append B to A: ``` C = A.Append(B); P' = C.Transform(P); ```
trans-unit.target: 将矩阵 A 追加到矩阵 B 表示转换按 B 和 a:``` A(B(...)) ```前面添加 A 到 B 表示转换按 A 和 b:``` B(A(...)) ```转换由 A 点 P 并且然后按照 B，将 B 追加到 a:``` C = A.Append(B); P' = C.Transform(P); ```

trans-unit.source: Matrix to append.
trans-unit.target: 要追加的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the determinant of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 检索此行列式<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: The determinant of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 此决定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Tests equality between two matrices.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个矩阵相等。

trans-unit.source: Object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要测试相等的对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the matrices are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指示矩阵是否相等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Tests equality between two matrices.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个矩阵相等。

trans-unit.source: The Matrix3D to which to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要与进行比较 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the matrices are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指示矩阵是否相等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Tests equality between two matrices.
trans-unit.target: 测试两个矩阵相等。

trans-unit.source: The first Matrix3D to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: The second Matrix3D to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the matrices are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指示矩阵是否相等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this matrix
trans-unit.target: 返回此矩阵的哈希代码

trans-unit.source: Integer that specifies the hash code for this matrix.
trans-unit.target: 指定此矩阵的哈希代码的整数。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> is invertible.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>是否可逆转。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Matrix3D structure has an inverse; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Matrix3D 结构具有逆实例;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Changes a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure into an identity <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 更改<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>到标识的结构<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。

trans-unit.source: The identity Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 标识 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Inverts this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 反转此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a Matrix3D structure is invertible, read its <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.HasInverse%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否可逆转 Matrix3D 结构，请阅读其<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.HasInverse%2A>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D.HasInverse%2A>

trans-unit.source: Throws InvalidOperationException if the matrix is not invertible.
trans-unit.target: 如果矩阵不可逆，则引发 InvalidOperationException。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure is affine.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>为仿射转换结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Matrix3D structure is affine; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Matrix3D 结构是仿射;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure is an identity Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构是一个标识 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the Matrix3D structure is an identity Matrix3D; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果 Matrix3D 结构是一个标识 Matrix3D;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> instances for exact equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>实例是否完全相等。

trans-unit.source: Note that double values can acquire error when operated upon, so that an exact comparison between two values that are logically equal may fail.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，双精度值可以获取错误运算时，以便逻辑上相等的两个值之间的精确比较可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, using this equality operator, Double.NaN is not equal to itself.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用此相等运算符，Double.NaN 不等于其自身。

trans-unit.source: The first matrix to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The second matrix to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个矩阵。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the two matrix instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指示两个矩阵实例是否相等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Compares two <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> instances for exact inequality.
trans-unit.target: 比较两个<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>确切是否不相等的实例。

trans-unit.source: Note that double values can acquire error when operated upon, so that an exact comparison between two values that are logically inequal may fail.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，双精度值可以获取错误运算时，以便逻辑上不相等的两个值之间的精确比较可能会失败。

trans-unit.source: Furthermore, using this equality operator, Double.NaN is not equal to itself.
trans-unit.target: 此外，使用此相等运算符，Double.NaN 不等于其自身。

trans-unit.source: The first matrix to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个矩阵。

trans-unit.source: The second matrix to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个矩阵。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Boolean> that indicates whether the two matrix instances are inequal.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Boolean>指示两个矩阵实例是否不相等。</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: Multiplies the specified matrices.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的矩阵相乘。

trans-unit.source: Matrix to multiply.
trans-unit.target: 要相乘的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Matrix by which the first matrix is multiplied.
trans-unit.target: 矩阵相乘的第一个矩阵。

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>这是乘法的结果。

trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式转换<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>到等效的 Matrix3D 结构的结构。

trans-unit.source: String representation of the Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Matrix3D structure represented by the string.
trans-unit.target: 字符串所表示的 Matrix3D 结构。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a specified matrix to the current matrix.
trans-unit.target: 将追加到当前矩阵指定的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Matrix to prepend.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的矩阵。

trans-unit.source: Appends a rotation transform to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将旋转转换追加到当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>表示旋转。

trans-unit.source: Rotates this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> about the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 旋转这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>有关指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>表示旋转。

trans-unit.source: Center <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Center <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>要围绕其旋转。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a rotation about a specified center <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 前面添加有关指定中心的旋转<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> that represents the rotation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>表示旋转。

trans-unit.source: Center <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> about which to rotate.
trans-unit.target: Center <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>要围绕其旋转。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a rotation specified by a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将指定旋转添加前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Quaternion"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Quaternion representing rotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示旋转的四元数。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified scale <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 追加指定的比例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D by which to scale this Matrix3D structure.
trans-unit.target: 缩放此 Matrix3D 结构的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Scales this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure by the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> about the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 缩放此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>由指定的结构<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>有关指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D by which to scale this Matrix3D structure.
trans-unit.target: 缩放此 Matrix3D 结构的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Point3D about which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 有关缩放的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Prepends the specified scale transformation about the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 前面添加有关指定指定的缩放变形<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>至此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> by which to scale this Matrix3D structure.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>用于缩放此 Matrix3D 结构。

trans-unit.source: Point3D about which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 有关缩放的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: Prepends the specifed scale <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的缩放添加前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>到当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D by which to scale this Matrix3D structure.
trans-unit.target: 缩放此 Matrix3D 结构的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Changes this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure into an identity matrix.
trans-unit.target: 更改此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>到某标识矩阵的结构。

trans-unit.source: In an identity matrix, all coefficients are 0 except the [1,1][2,2][3,3][4,4] coefficients, which are set to 1.
trans-unit.target: 中某标识矩阵，所有系数都均为 [1，1] 除 0 [2，2] [3，3] [4，4] 设置为 1 的系数。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is special in that when it is applied to vertices, they are unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵很特殊，，因为如果它应用于顶点，他们就是不变。

trans-unit.source: The identity matrix is used as the starting point for matrices that modify vertex values to create rotations, translations, and any other transformations that can be represented by a 4x4 matrix.
trans-unit.target: 标识矩阵用作修改顶点值创建旋转、 翻译和任何其他可表示的 4 x 4 矩阵的转换矩阵的起始点。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式的当前实例的值设置。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 使用的类型定义的默认格式<xref:System.IFormattable>实现。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用于设置值的格式提供程序。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -空引用 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 来从操作系统的当前区域设置获取数字格式信息。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 指定的格式中的当前实例的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: String representation of this Matrix3D structure.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式此 Matrix3D 结构。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 创建的字符串表示形式这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Culture-specified formatting information.
trans-unit.target: 指定区域性的格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: String representation of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的这<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>通过<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: Point3D to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的 Point3D。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming point by this Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 转换的结果 point 通过此 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Throws InvalidOperationException if the transform is not affine.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是仿射转换，则引发 InvalidOperationException。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref> objects in the array by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D"></xref>由数组中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Point3D objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的点的 Point3D 对象。

trans-unit.source: The original points in the array are replaced by their transformed values.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的原始点将由其转换后的值替换。

trans-unit.source: Throws InvalidOperationException if the transform is not affine.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是仿射转换，则引发 InvalidOperationException。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> and returns the result..
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>通过<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>并返回结果...

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>要转换。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming point by this Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 转换的结果 point 通过此 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> objects in the array by the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> and returns the result.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>由数组中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>并返回结果。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref> objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point4D"></xref>要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The original points in the array are replaced by their transformed values.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的原始点将由其转换后的值替换。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>由此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>要转换。

trans-unit.source: The result of transforming vector by this Matrix3D.
trans-unit.target: 转换的结果 vector 通过此 Matrix3D。

trans-unit.source: Transforms the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> objects in the array by this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 转换指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>此数组中的对象<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> objects to transform.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The original Vector3D objects in the array are replaced by their transformed values.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的原始 Vector3D 对象将替换为其已转换的值。

trans-unit.source: Appends a translation of the specified offset to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的偏移量的翻译追加到当前<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the offset for transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>指定转换的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Prepends a translation of the specified offset to this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref> structure.
trans-unit.target: 前面添加的指定的偏移量到此平移<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D"></xref>结构。

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the offset for transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>指定转换的偏移量。
